Name: King of Spades
Effect: Action: Pay 2 Material for your next piece played this turn enter ready

Name: King of Diamond
Effect: Action: Draw 1, Discard 1. If you control no other pieces, draw 2 instead.

Name: King of Hearts
Effect: Action: Pay 2 Material Deal 2 damage to a piece. If it is captured this turn, draw 1 card.

Name: King of Clubs
Effect: Action: Give a piece +1/+1. If it has no other buffs, gain 1 material.
